title: Tatsumi Nanami Can’t Stop Hypnotic M*sturbation - Novel Updates
author: Mutsuki Miyama   むつきみやま
description:
Like the title states, this is a story about the protagonist Tatsumi Nanami doing nothing but performing hypnotic masturbation. Generally, each story will conclude in a single chapter, but it will be organized so that at most a story will take 3 chapters. Though there is a female protagonist, she will generally be listening to a female hypnotic voice.

Also, the hypnotic voice that appears in this story is fictional, and does not exist in reality. >
